summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Madison Street and East Madison Street, from 5th Avenue to 12th Avenue; by widening roadway, paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10330 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
